segments.text: You shouldn't have stayed up so late watching TV . I told you we had to get an early start .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but that movie was just too good to leave . I guess I'll just have to pay the price and be sleepy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to eat breakfast here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Why don't we just grad a bite at the coffee shop next door ?
segments.speaker: S2
